channel.title: CVE Feed for propertyhive -- PropertyHive
channel.description: The latest CVEs for propertyhive -- PropertyHive

item.title: CVE-2023-22706|2024-08-02T10:13:50.128Z -- propertyhive -- propertyhive
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PropertyHive plugin <=Â 1.5.48 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-34381|2024-08-02T02:51:11.262Z -- propertyhive -- propertyhive
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PropertyHive allows Stored XSS.This issue affects PropertyHive: from n/a through 2.0.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-3607|2024-08-01T20:12:07.919Z -- propertyhive -- propertyhive
item.description: The PropertyHive plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the delete_key_date() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.0.12. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to delete arbitrary posts

item.title: CVE-2024-29923|2024-03-27T07:20:20.972Z -- propertyhive -- propertyhive
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PropertyHive allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects PropertyHive: from n/a through 2.0.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-27985|2024-03-21T15:18:44.354Z -- propertyhive -- propertyhive
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in PropertyHive.This issue affects PropertyHive: from n/a through 2.0.9.
